original_title: 闇金ウシジマくん ザ・ファイナル
overview: A classmate from Ushijima's middle school days, Takemoto, shows up. He was a kind man, but now is jobless and without a home. Adrift and unable to borrow money from Ushijima, Takemoto heads for Seiai Home where he can stay while doing work.
title: Ushijima the Loan Shark The Final
